modName: TAKE NEW SLOT Glasses Ears Earring everything in accessories
summary: Tired of putting accessories in necklace or rings?! Now you can get a variety of splendid accessories and they all take a brand NEW SLOT in your armor section!!
descriptionHtml:
Check this vid out to have a look at those accessories!
[youtube]85TZDhY2W2g[/youtube]

[*Only Alpha version now!! All mods come from Oblivion!*]
[Arrow & Knee Mod Team]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11068-1-1330100002.jpg[/img]

Features!
-It categories new accessories in brand new slot so you won\'t need to worry about WHAT TO REPLACE! 
-[b]Items are automatically gained in your inventory (2 each)[/b]

[b]Because of the script, if you change your armor/accessories too quick, there will be a small chance that the game crashes...[/b]
We recommen you to save your game first after collecting those items

As for now we have:
-2 Earrings
-6 pairs of wings
-6 pairs of glasses
-1 ear

(
You can get these items by using Player.AddItem <ID>
IDs:
xxfff101~xxfff11a xxfff11b
xxfff11c  xxfff11d  xxfff11e xxfff120
WHERE xx is your load order in NMM
*YOU CANNOT GET THESE ITEMS BY CRAFTING AS FOR NOW*
)

Installation
Just simply use NMM to install it or else you might need to put those files into the correct folders yourself and load the esp file.

CHANGE LOG
03 Mar 2012
-Added 1 earring and 6 pairs of wings
24 Feb 2012
-Added Glasses, Ears, and Earrings.

SPECIAL THANKS
-Froda: Who I worked with to figure out the new slots!
author: magicmoon
